title: Vengeance Is Mine
itunes:title: Vengeance Is Mine
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I was married for 7 years and I’m almost divorced. My husband and I didn’t really know each other as well as we should’ve before we got married and we had arguments on a daily basis. I became bitter over his lack of attentiveness and he was tired of living with a crazy B. Those were his exact words the day he filed for divorce. He told me I am terrible in bed, teased me for gaining a few pounds and said he’s been miserable for seven years.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I was married for 7 years and I’m almost divorced. My husband and I didn’t really know each other as well as we should’ve before we got married and we had arguments on a daily basis. I became bitter over his lack of attentiveness and he was tired of living with a crazy B. Those were his exact words the day he filed for divorce. He told me I am terrible in bed, teased me for gaining a few pounds and said he’s been miserable for seven years.................
